text:
After running a transcoder, it seems an AWT object is not being disposed, 
necessesitating System.exit(0) to terminate the program otherwise the module 
hangs. System.exit(0) is performed in the example on the Batik Apache website 
example (so I assume it is known, but I could not find a bug report for it).
creator: anthony.leon@ubsw.com

text:
this is a bug of jdk1.3 or lower.
It's fixed in jdk1.4
creator: tkormann@apache.org
